workflow.name: CA- Automation Import Workflow With SecString using JSON and GIT
workflow.title: CA- Automation Import Workflow With SecString using JSON and GIT

properties.name: Provide Token Password for "ChandraAddan" GIT Account
WF JSON
WF With secure string in Plain text

properties.description:
Importing Workflow  with Secure String using JSON and GIt Target
1. Importing Workflow but UI asks the user to enter the secure string
2. Next step in payload providing the  secure string variable Then Importing 
3. Once WF Got Imported successfully, Verify the import status
4. Validate and executes the workflow
5. Once execution completes, will verify the instance status (Success/Failed)
6. Then Deletes the WF Instance
7. Finally will delete The workflow
8. If Workflow Imported  using Git, will delete the  account key and Target
properties.display_name: CA- Automation Import Workflow With SecString using JSON and GIT

properties.body:
{
  "name": "CA GIT test Import with securestring",
  "title": "CA GIT test Import with SecureString",
  "properties": {
    "no_runtime_user": false,
    "repo_type": "github",
    "branch": "master",
    "display_name": "CA GIT test Import/Export",
    "default_runtime_user_id": "$activity.definition_activity_01MY6WU92CMFU4KoX4TEw4xzsmuqdsFvWNz.output.jsonpath_queries.GIT Accountkey ID$",
    "protocol": "https",
    "repo": "api.github.com/repos/ChandraAddan/Test"
  },
  "type": "git.repository",
  "base_type": "target"
}
